com.mozium.core.task

Class AbstractTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mozium.core.task.AbstractTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddValueTask, AlertTask, CheckTask, CheckTask, ClearTask, ClearTask, ClickHelperTask, ClickTask, ClickTask, CookiesTask, DoubleClickTask, HoverTask, JsExecutorTask, KeyBoardTask, KeyBoardTask, MouseTask, NavigationTask, RadioCheckTask, SelectTask, SelectTask, SubmitTask, SwipeTask, TouchTask, TypeTask, TypeTask, WaitTask, WindowTask

    public abstract class AbstractTask
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage the life cycle of each action in Mozium. An action is represented using the design pattern Task-based-testing. Each action (or assertion) is considered as profil task. It have two final states success or failure
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    mba
